mapper.select: SELECT *,(g.price+o.price_updown) AS final_price FROM tb_cart c LEFT JOIN tb_goods g ON c.goods_no=g.goods_no LEFT JOIN tb_goods_option o ON c.option_no=o.option_no WHERE c.member_no=#{c.member_no} ORDER BY c.cart_add_date DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_cart (goods_count, cart_add_date, goods_no, member_no, option_no) VALUES (#{goods_count}, NOW(), #{goods_no}, #{member_no}, #{option_no})
